summary: Add support for protobuf payload converters (JSON and binary formats) to the TypeScript SDK to enable full cross-language interoperability. This requires implementing a payload converter and integrating it with the default data converter.
userImpact: Users cannot fully support cross-language calls without protobuf payload converter support, limiting interoperability between Temporal SDKs.
proposedFix: Implement a payload converter that supports reading and writing protobuf payloads (both JSON and binary formats) and add it to the default data converter.
resolutionDetails: Protobuf payload converter support was implemented and added to the default data converter for TypeScript SDK.
keyQuote: To fully support cross language calls we need to support the json and binary protobuf payload types.
